name: Light Aim Helper (POST Godot Wild Jam #40)
name_original: Light Aim Helper (POST Godot Wild Jam #40)
description:
Years have passed, and you and your LAH (Light Aim Helper) are lost somewhere in the universe constantly feeding a black hole, carrying on the now vain mission entrusted to you.

CONTROLS:

  • Move the ship with WASD or the ARROW KEYS
  • Move your LAH (Light Aim Helper) with the mouse
  • Shoot with LMB (Left Mouse Button) to the black hole
  • Shoot with RMB (Right Mouse Button) to destroy the asteroids
  • Press R to restart

GAMEPLAY:

  • Keep feeding the black hole, while you dodge the asteroids. Coordinate your movement using the keyboard to move the ship, and the mouse to move your LAH. You can destroy an asteroid hitting it with 3 stars (RMB).
  • TIP: If you enter the black hole with your ship or your LAH, it's game over.

WHATS NEXT:

  • I don't know. All my unpublished projects have in some way a story and a narrative context in which the action take place. So, probably I'll update this game with the features I've in mind, mainly for improve my skill in programming and art. I'm not sure if implement the narrative in this game or move the idea to another project, using a different aesthetics but with the same gameplay core. I'll definitely make a post about, so feel free to follow my profile. Thanks for reading.

Godot Wild Jam #40 entry:

  • This is the updated version of my entry for the Godot Wild Jam #40. You can find the original version "The Hungry Baby Black Hole" on my profile page.

All credits are in the related section in the game main menu.

During the development of this game I fell in love with Ikaruga and its message. This game is dedicated to that masterpiece.
